metadata.title: CVE-2015-5723 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Doctrine Annotations before 1.2.7, Cache before 1.3.2 and 1.4.x before1.4.2, Common before 2.4.3 and 2.5.x before 2.5.1, ORM before 2.4.8 or2.5.x before 2.5.1, MongoDB ODM before 1.0.2, and MongoDB ODM Bundle before3.0.1 use world-writable permissions for cache directories, which allowslocal users to execute arbitrary PHP code with additional privileges byleveraging an application with the umask set to 0 and that executes cacheentries as code.

criterions.comment: doctrine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
